name: Exalted Vessel
description:
"I shall bless you with my power once again"

Exalted Vessel is a fast-paced, dungeon crawler roguelike where you, a vessel, fight your way through hoards of demons while obtaining blessing from gods, armed with nothing but your trusty aegis.

Will you be able to master the dungeon?

This is just an alpha version of the game.  All feedback is extremely appreciated.  I want to expand on this game, but I cant really do it alone.  So if you have any thoughts about what could be changed, tell me!
